meta.title: Technology
meta.description: A connected solutions ecosystem to turn your tools into a growth lever.
hero.subtitle.before: We master the most advanced technology architectures to turn your tools into a
philosophy.title: The system before the tool.
philosophy.subtitle: The tool is only a means. Our value lies in the architecture that enables these technologies to communicate and produce reliable data.

philosophy.cards.title: Agnostic
philosophy.cards.description: We don't force a tool. We choose the one that fairly serves your strategy.

philosophy.cards.title: Connected
philosophy.cards.description: Data must flow freely. We remove silos for a single source of truth.

philosophy.cards.title: Certified
philosophy.cards.description: We are official and certified partners on the most powerful solutions on the market.

ecosystem.title: Our Tech Ecosystem
ecosystem.subtitle: The solutions we implement, from official partnerships to expert technical mastery.
partnerForm.subtitle: Do you develop a software solution that transforms B2B business growth? Join our architects' ecosystem.

partnerForm.benefits.title: Strategic Partnership
partnerForm.benefits.description: Privileged access to our Studio for deploying your solution to our clients.

partnerForm.benefits.title: Co-Marketing & Events
partnerForm.benefits.description: Webinars, podcasts and masterclasses together to evangelise the market.

partnerForm.benefits.title: Product Expertise
partnerForm.benefits.description: Operational feedback from our senior architects to optimise your integrations.
